info.name: No p Padding on Habitica Task List
info.description: Removes the 8px padding after paragraphs in the task list, which was causing increased spacing between elements of the task, like the title or checklist items and the bottom.
info.additionalInfo: Update 2018-10-02: Reverts padding change to checklist items so they're not scrunched against each other if you're using this style.
